# Support

Thank you for using the Goods Unite Us iOS App! We're here to help.

## üôã‚Äç‚ôÄHow to Get Help

For questions, feedback, or help with the app:

- For technical support...
 - Join our community
     - Discussions: [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/Goods-Unite-Us/goods-unite-us-public-template/discussions)
     - Discord: [Community Discord server](https://discord.com/goods-unite-us-community)
     - Reddit: [r/goodsuniteuscommunity](https://reddit/r/goodsuniteuscommunity) 
 - Email us: [support@goodsuniteus.com](mailto:support@goodsuniteus.com)
- Visit our website: [https://goodsuniteus.com](https://goodsuniteus.com)

## Found a Bug?

Please [open an issue](https://github.com/goodsuniteus/goods-unite-us-public-template/issues) and provide the following information:

- Steps to reproduce
- Expected vs. actual behavior
- Screenshots (if applicable)
- O/S, version and device type

For sensitive security concerns, please email us at [security@goodsuniteus.com](mailto:security@goodsuniteus.com)


## Have a Feature Request?

We‚Äôd love to hear from you! Open a GitHub issue with your ideas. We prioritize feature development based on user feedback and mission alignment.
